meanings.definition: The act of dividing a district into smaller districts.
meanings.sent1: Subdistricting helps organize a big area into smaller parts.
meanings.sent2: The city council discussed subdistricting to better serve local communities.
meanings.sent3: When the mayor tried subdistricting the town, everyone ended up in the wrong place!
meanings.sent4: Subdistricting is like cutting a cake into many slices for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The concept of subdistricting is like creating mini neighborhoods within a city.

meanings.definition: The process of creating subdistricts within a larger district.
meanings.sent1: Subdistricting involves establishing smaller zones within a big area.
meanings.sent2: During subdistricting, each new area gets its own representative.
meanings.sent3: The subdistricting meeting turned into a neighborhood block party!
meanings.sent4: Subdistricting is like building a puzzle with many small pieces.
meanings.sent5: The idea of subdistricting is to make governance more accessible to local residents.
